title: Mayo ROIs
description: Coordinates of regions of interest (ROIs) computed from the Mayo competition data.

fields.name: roi_num
fields.description: The index of the ROI within the image

fields.name: x
fields.description: The leftmost pixel coordinate of the ROI

fields.name: y
fields.description: The topmost pixel coordinate of the ROI

fields.name: w
fields.description: The pixel width of the ROI

fields.name: h
fields.description: The pixel height of the ROI

fields.name: thresh
fields.description: The Otsu threshold computed for the image mask
